base64EncodeDecode.title: Base64 Encoder / Decoder
base64EncodeDecode.description: This page provides a tool for encoding text to Base64 and decoding Base64-encoded strings back to their original text. Enter your string in the input field above and click the buttons to see the transformation results.
base64EncodeDecode.inputPlaceholder: Enter the text to encode in Base64 or the Base64 string to decode.
base64EncodeDecode.noInputError: The input field is empty. Please check and provide the necessary input.
base64EncodeDecode.encodingError: It seems the input cannot be encoded into Base64 or there's an issue with it.
base64EncodeDecode.decodingError: It seems the input is not a valid Base64 string.

base64Encoding.title: Base64 Encoding
base64Encoding.description: Base64 encoding is a method of converting binary data into a text format to maintain data integrity while transmitting. Base64 encoding uses 64 characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9, +, /) to encode binary data into text.

steps.1: Input data is first divided into 8-bit bytes.
steps.2: These bytes are then grouped into 6-bit blocks. Each 6-bit block is converted to a character in the Base64 character set.
steps.3: The resulting Base64 string is padded with '=' characters if necessary to make the length a multiple of 4.

base64Decoding.title: Base64 Decoding
base64Decoding.description: Base64 decoding is the process of converting a Base64-encoded string back into its original binary data to restore the original information.

steps.1: Remove '=' characters from the end of the Base64 string.
steps.2: Convert each Base64 character to its corresponding 6-bit value.
steps.3: Reconstruct the 8-bit bytes from these 6-bit values to restore the original binary data.

steps.1: Text Input: Enter the string you want to encode in Base64 or the Base64 string you want to decode in the text input area.
steps.2: Encode / Decode: Click the 'Encode to Base64' / 'Decode to String' button to encode the string into Base64 or decode the Base64 string.
steps.3: Check Results: The converted result will be displayed in the output area.
steps.4: Copy Result: Click the copy button next to the output area to copy the result to your clipboard.

countLetters.title: Letter Counter
countLetters.description: This page is a tool that counts the number of letters you input. Enter a sentence in the input field below, and it will count the letters in real-time.
countLetters.inputPlaceholder: Please enter a sentence to count the letters.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The 'Count Letters' tool is a simple yet powerful utility that calculates the number of characters, words, and spaces in the text you input, all in real time. Whether you're writing an essay, preparing a report, or tracking the character count for social media, this tool helps you monitor and optimize the length of your text as you type.

steps.1: Real-time Counting: Automatically updates the character, word, and space count as you type.
steps.2: Flexible Input: Easily paste or type text into the input area.
steps.3: Detailed Statistics: Displays character count including and excluding spaces, as well as the total word count separately.
steps.4: User-friendly Interface: Simple, intuitive, and clean layout for easy use.

steps.1: Enter Text: Type or paste your text into the provided input area.
steps.2: Check the Count: The tool will automatically display the character count with and without spaces, as well as the total word count, in real time.
steps.3: Optimize Your Text: Adjust your text based on the provided counts to meet specific requirements.

security.title: Security Notice
security.description: All text input is processed locally in your browser. Your data is never sent to a server, ensuring that your text remains private and secure from any leaks or monitoring.

freeUsage.title: Free to Use
freeUsage.description: This tool is completely free to use and is accessible to everyone. You can use it directly in your web browser without the need to download any software.

example.title: Example Usage
example.description: For example, if you paste the sentence 'Hello World!' into the input area, this tool will count it as 12 characters including spaces, 11 characters excluding spaces, and 2 words.

steps.1: Maintain character limits to improve the quality of your writing.
steps.2: Adjust text to meet the specific requirements of social media, assignments, reports, or other formats.
steps.3: Receive real-time feedback on text length, making it easier to enhance your editing process.
